long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Source Manager Extension
The Source Manager Extension is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help users seamlessly collect, organize, and manage online resources while browsing. Ideal for students, researchers, and writers, this tool allows users to capture and save website links along with custom descriptions, making it easy to reference sources for academic papers, projects, or personal notes.

With features like:

Effortless Source Saving: Save website URLs with just one click and add a custom description to each link.

Edit and Delete Sources: Modify descriptions or remove sources from your list with an intuitive interface.

Clear All Functionality: Double-click the "DELETE ALL" button to clear your entire list of saved sources.

User-Friendly Interface: A clean, easy-to-navigate UI for quick source management.
